price: Nuti isaan hin miine; garuu isaan (ofumaaf) miidhaa hojjattoota ta’an.
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
